sections.title: Fresh Local Food, Made Daily
sections.text: At PASTI, we cook simple and fresh food using local ingredients. No shortcuts, no frozen items — just honest meals prepared every day.

sections.title: Loved by Locals & Travelers
sections.text: From Mahiyanganaya locals to foreign visitors, PASTI is known for tasty food, friendly service, and a calm place to enjoy your meal.

sections.title: Simple Menu, Big Flavours
sections.text: Our menu focuses on popular Sri Lankan and café-style food. Every dish is prepared fresh and served hot.

sections.title: A Calm Place to Eat & Relax
sections.text: Whether you live nearby or are visiting Mahiyanganaya, PASTI is a comfortable place to eat, relax, and enjoy good food.
